nodes.text: The new Umboo Lightstation was a starship operated by Governor Koong of Roon's Tawntoom province.

After Koong closed the original Umboo Lightstation, he used the ship's lights to lure unsuspecting vessels towards it, bringing them aboard with a tractor beam and seizing their cargo. In 15 BBY, Mungo Baobab was brought aboard on his ship, the Caravel, but the merchant was able to escape his captivity and the new Umboo Lightstation was destroyed when its engines were damaged and it collided with an asteroid.
